answers.answer: Hi!If you were my patient, I would evaluate you for some conditions such as a UTI or diabetes.  I would also ask about medications--do you take any water pills or diuretics?  I would ask about age and menopause, and number of children, etc.  Depending upon where you are with all of those issues, medications OR surgery might very dramatically improve your symptoms.Because a lot more information is needed and an examination, and probably also some lab tests, I would strongly recommend that you see your doctor--GP or ob/gynGood luck!Dr B

question: I urinate frequently and find it uncontrollable when I am very pressed. Any suggestion.?
title: please help
